A cooperation ninjutsu used by a [[Wind Release]] and a [[Lightning Release]] user. The Wind Release user creates a giant tornado which spins towards the opponent, after which the Lightning Release user run an electrical current through the tornado. This has devastating effects on the opponent.

[[pl:Fūjin to Raijin no Jutsu]]
